system.descriptionText: Wearer counts as having a Positional Relay Equipped and gains the benefits of it. (Acts as a long-range Vox. Allowing communications up to 10km. Due to inbuilt security, attempts to subvert or listen in on the vox have have -30 to relevent tests.)

description.value: Wearer counts as having a Positional Relay Equipped and gains the benefits of it. (Acts as a long-range Vox. Allowing communications up to 10km. Due to inbuilt security, attempts to subvert or listen in on the vox have have -30 to relevent tests.)
